name: Xeno-Void
description:
Twinstick shooter about getting powerup's and shooting stuff in space!!

For the time being the free demo version contains the full game in it's current state.

Controls:

  • move ship -- WASD or right anolog stick.
  • aim/shoot -- mouse/arrow-keys or left analog stick.
  • dodge -- space or left/right bumper,  L1/R1.
  • restart -- R or Y/TRIANGLE
  • toggle fullscreen -- F1.
  • exit -- menu.
